channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2024
item.description: On October 30th, 2024, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project with the latest news, announcements, and some insights into the project’s future.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update October 2024
item.description: It’s been a while but the next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will be back on Wednesday, October 30th, 2024 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Project Newsletter Launch: Stay Informed!
item.description: At PrestaShop, we are always looking for ways to strengthen our relationship with the community. In line with this, we are thrilled to announce the launch of the PrestaShop Project Newsletter, a new initiative designed to bring you technical insights, exclusive updates, and educational content like never before.

item.title: Register Now for the PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024
item.description: The world of ecommerce is constantly evolving, and staying on top of the latest trends and innovations is essential for developers and businesses. That’s why we are thrilled to invite you to the second edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place on November 6, 2024, in Paris.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a new minor version of PrestaShop 8.2. This version includes a few improvements, as well as bug fixes.

item.title: OW2 Webinar - PrestaShop Presentation on September 26
item.description: On September 26, the OW2 organization will hold a webinar, presented in part by Clément Désiles from PrestaShop.

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.1.0 and 6.2.0 are Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see version 6.0.0 release blogpost), these versions bring a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.1.0 and 6.2.0 bring to the upgrade module.

item.title: PrestaShop Back Office rebranding with PrestaShop 9
item.description: By the end of 2023, PrestaShop unveiled a new brand identity to strengthen its position, enhance credibility, and build trust. We already announced the new branding for the project, and the PrestaShop back office is one of the last assets to follow this change. The release of PrestaShop 9 provided the perfect opportunity for this update. The rebranding involved significant changes to the PrestaShop back office, focusing on its two themes.

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.0.0 is Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see versions 5.0.2 and 5.0.3 live presentation), this version brings a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.0.0 brings to the Autoupgrade module.

item.title: Second PrestaShop Developer Conference - Participate as a Speaker
item.description: Are you a passionate PrestaShop developer or enthusiast? We are happy to announce that the call for presentations is now open for the second edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, happening on November 6, 2024 in Paris, France. This event offers a prime opportunity to engage in developer discussions, better understand solutions, and connect with fellow community members.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.7 Is Available
item.description: A new patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available! This release includes several significant improvements and numerous bug fixes. In this article, we’ll explore these updates in detail.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - June 2024
item.description: On June 19th, 2024, we hosted the fifth Live Update of the year. We had the opportunity to talk about PrestaShop 9 and get to know the team working on, among other things, the PrestaShop autoupgrade module.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update June 2024
item.description: The next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, June 19th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Meet the new API Platform-based API in PrestaShop 9
item.description: A new feature in PrestaShop 9 provides the community a new, secure, modern, and extensible API based on the API Platform. In this article I will show you how to start using it.

item.title: PrestaShop 9 Alpha 1 is Available!
item.description: Here it is. The first public alpha of PrestaShop 9 is available. We decided it was time to share with you the first results of our work on PrestaShop 9.
